page.shortlink: api client api u class set content method

argument.name: ele
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element.

argument.name: content
argument.description: The content to place in the element.

page.description: Sets the content of an element. Similar to calling .innerHTML on a DOM element with additional handling to preserve touch behaviors.
page.discussion: Using A5.u.element.setContent() is like setting the .innerHTML of ele. Unlike .innerHTML, A5.u.element.setContent() will not destroy drag scrolling behavior on objects such as Panel Cards.
